subject: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Sir
Your overdue payment of $15m which has been approved for immediate release to you.
kindly respond for next procedures.
Mr Zakky Ali

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Hello Mr. Zakky Ali,

Thank you for reaching out to me about this overdue payment. I must admit, I'm a bit surprised as I don't recall having any pending payments. Could you please provide more details? For instance, what is this payment related to? And why has it been approved for immediate release?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Yvonne

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Yvonne

Thanks for the email response and your questions, the fund $15 million
United States Dollars is your overdue inheritance fund which was in our
escrow account (Apex Bank Plc) before we decided to move it to current
office in Amsterdam Holland where you will go in person to pick up the fund
by cash payment.

The reasons are because imposter that are aware of the fund wants to claim
it without your consent or permission to do so.

Secondly the fund has over stayed because it was proposed to be long term
but quest to get in touch with you all this while made it so but finally we
where able to reach you for the claim.

I would like you to send me your mobile number as soon as possible and your
any means of identification.

The fund has been approved for immediate release to you because all is
required for you to be there in person at the office in Amsterdam Holland.

Waiting to hear from you soonest.

Mr Zakky Ali

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Hello Mr. Zakky Ali,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation about the fund. It's quite a surprise to hear about this overdue fund, I must say.

I'm curious though, how did my name get associated with this fund? And why was it moved to Holland? Also, could you please explain more about these imposters who are trying to claim the fund without my consent?

I appreciate your request for my mobile number, but I prefer to keep our conversation here over email for now. I hope that's okay with you.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Yvonne

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Yvonne

Your names got associated with the fund as the next of kin and sole
beneficiary of the fund to Jessica Karen Saunders who was a contractor to
federal government of nigeria on crude oil and pipeline maintenance before
her death years back and your email info was only communication to reach
out for you.

The imposters knew about this fund and they wanted to claim it without your
consent. That is why we moved the fund to Amsterdam Holland so it can be
easy for you to go and pick up the fund.

your number is very important. If not there is no way I can proceed with
you because to contact the company mobile number must be ready.

Mr Zakky Ali
